trans:
We want this couple to be discovered by more people. They deserve to get it. If everyone knows Lookmee and Sonya, you will fall in love with them the same as me because loving Lookmee and Sonya is never a regret. ü§ç
As we always support EngLot, on behalf of the fan club, just seeing them follow each other on Instagram and like each other‚Äôs photos made me so happy. üò≠ But now it came up with a video, and also has a four-person photo. It's beyond my expectation.
My feeling cannot be described now. My feeling cannot expressed into the words. I‚Äôm over the moon! It's the most complete thing about being a fan.
Thank you, myself, for introducing me to Lookmee and Sonya. Thank you, Lookmee and Sonya, for determining to reject being a flight attendant and becoming actors. Thank both of you for finding each other. Thank you, P'Es and P'Chod, for seeing the chemistry between them. Thank you for all your efforts to create such a wonderful series like Affair. Thank you for existing. Thank you for your being born for us and the gang to love. ‚ò∫Ô∏èüíù
